text: The Power Within is the fifth studio album by DragonForce. It was released on April 11, 2012 in Japan and on April 15, 2012 worldwide. It is the first album to have Mark Hudson on vocals. == Track listing == == Personnel == === Band members === *Marc Hudson – Vocals *Herman Li – Guitars, backing vocals, producing, mixing, engineering *Sam Totman – Guitars, backing vocals, producing, mixing *Vadim Pruzhanov – Keyboards, piano, theremin, Kaoss Pad, backing vocals *Dave Mackintosh – Drums, backing vocals *Frédéric Leclercq – Bass, backing vocals, additional guitars Category:Power metal Category:DragonForce Category:2008 albums
title: The Power Within
